tooltip.extendedcrafting.auto_table_save: Shift + 左鍵 儲存此配方
tooltip.extendedcrafting.auto_table_dele: Shift + 左鍵 刪除此配方
message.extendedcrafting.max_unique_item: 在一個成型的資料包配方中，你最多只能有（%s）個獨特的物品。
book.extendedcrafting.name: 擴展合成
book.extendedcrafting.landing_text: 擴展合成加入了許多合成的新方式，以及額外的合成物品與實用程序。$(br2)這本指南書僅用於解釋基本功能，因為不同的合成方式是由模組包製作者來決定的。
本節介紹擴展合成添加的不同製作機制
book.extendedcrafting.category.component: 本節介紹擴展合成添加的不同製作項目
book.extendedcrafting.category.utilities: 本節介紹擴展合成添加的各種製作實用程序
Combination Crafting is an in-world multi-block crafting setup where items are combined together to create something $(italic)special.$() $(br2)This setup consists of a Crafting Core in the center and pedestals placed around it. Pedestals can be placed anywhere around the Crafting Core in a 3 block radius, and must be on the same Y level.

Power must be provided to the Crafting Core for this structure to function. $(br2)Recipes have a center item which goes on the Crafting Core, and pedestal items which go on the pedestals around it. $(br)Right clicking on the side of the Crafting Core will show you information about the current crafting operation, such as progress or power cost, as well as how much power is stored in it.
This mod adds tiered crafting tables that come in $(bold)3x3$(), $(bold)5x5$(), $(bold)7x7$(), and $(bold)9x9$() sizes. These tables hold their inventories when closed.
Quantum Compression is the process of compressing items a little too much. This is done using a Quantum Compressor. $(br2)The Quantum Compressor is a powered machine that can hold and compress extremely large amounts of materials. Items placed inside the Quantum Compressor go into an internal buffer for use in compression. The buffer is represented as a blue bar.

Each recipe $(bold)usually$() requires a catalyst. The catalyst is placed in the left-most slot and does not get used up. $(br2)Once there are enough items in the buffer, the machine will begin to craft the item. The Quantum Compressor will only use power while crafting. $(br2)If you happen to put items into the compressor that you would rather not lose forever, you can press the eject button above the input slot to get them back.

Items in the buffer are stored in the endless void and can only be re-obtained by ejecting. Breaking the block will cause those items to get lost forever, so be careful! $(br2)The item input buffer of the Quantum Compressor is capable of holding $(bold)billions$() of items, but by default will only hold as many as the recipe requires. You can disable this limit by clicking on the lock button next to the input buffer.
book.extendedcrafting.entry.ender_crafti: 終界合成使用來自於虛空的力量。終界合成的設置包含終界合成台和終界發電機。合成台通過終界發電機從虛空中獲取能量。 您擁有的終界發電機越多，它的製造速度就越快。
終界發電機可放置在終界合成台周圍$(bold)3格半徑$()內的的任何位置。甚至在不同Y軸！
Auto Crafting Tables are an upgraded version of $(l:crafting/tables)Crafting Tables$() that can automatically insert items and be piped out of. $(br2)Item insertion is done by simply placing a chest above the table, and inserting items into said chest. Item insertion uses power.

For item insertion to work, you must lay out a recipe in the grid and save the recipe. This is done by shift+left clicking on one of the 3 recipe slots in the top right. You can then select the recipe by clicking on it. You can delete the recipe by shift+left clicking it. $(br2)Items can be extracted from the table by a hopper or any other compatible item extraction mechanism.
You can disable auto crafting by clicking on the down arrow under the output slot.
book.extendedcrafting.entry.singularitie: 奇點是高度壓縮的物質，它們$(bold)通常$()由$(l:crafting/compression)量子壓縮機$()製作。$(br2)奇點$(bold)可以$()製作很多東西，像是$(l:components/ultimate_singularity)終極奇異點$()
book.extendedcrafting.entry.ultimate_sin: 終極奇點是 $(bold)通常$()在$(l:crafting/tables)終極製作表$()。 $(br2)它$(bold)通常$()由所有（如果不是大多數）可用的奇點製成。
book.extendedcrafting.entry.handheld_tab: 手持式工作台就是一個工作台
